inclusion.criterion: Rome IV criteria for IBS diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Investigation to exclude other gastrointestinal organic cause(s)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of antibiotics or probiotics within 1 month prior to FMT
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Kidney failure or chronic heart disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes, but no kidney failure or chronic heart disease mentioned.
